trans_title: 凯尔特人：不为人知的故事
introduction: Very little is known about the CELTS, who appeared in central Europe around 1200 BC and migrated westward between the 5th and 1st centuries B.C. Through archaeological excavations, expert commentary, 3D animation and historical reconstructions, this 3-part documentary series will delve into the mysteries, myths, and arcane history of the CELTS, and reveal brand new information about the ancient civilization.Distributed by: KM+BM Media1. Episode 1: Dawn of the Celts2. Episode 2: The Art and War3. Episode 3: Skyfall
chinese_title: 凯尔特人：不为人知的故事
